thread.title: Click here to help hurricane victims in Florida, Puerto Rico

posts.title: Click here to help hurricane victims in Florida, Puerto Rico
posts.text:
Loading… Join WESH 2 News in supporting the American Red Cross. 
Please join WESH 2 News in supporting the American Red Cross relief efforts. You can donate through this page or by calling 1-800-596-6567. Your donations will enable the American Red Cross to provide food, water and shelter, as well as the support needed for long-term recovery, in respective communities affected. Current Contributions $1,430 Donated 16 Contributions Please enter an amount less than [{{ form.donationFlow['donation.amount.maximumAmount'] | currency }}]. If you'd like to give more, please call 1-800-RED CROSS. I Want to Support One Time Your donation of {{ model.donation.amount | currency }} will be made today and on the 10th of each following month using the payment method selected. You may cancel or change this amount at any time. I Want to Give:
